title.en: Aspiration to Be Reborn at the Vajra Seat (Bodhgayā), Akaniṣṭha on Earth

text.en: Emaho!
text.en-trans: emaho

text.en: The Vajra Seat at the heart of this world of Jambudvīpa,
text.en-trans: dzamling sa yi tewa dorjé den

text.en: A realm where the victorious buddhas of the three times awaken,
text.en-trans: dü sum gyalwa ngönpar tsang gya dang

text.en: Conquer Māra and turn the Wheel of Dharma—
text.en-trans: dü tul chökyi khorlo korwé zhing

text.en: There, in that extraordinarily sublime place, may I take birth.
text.en-trans: né chok khyepar chen du kyewar shok

text.en: Sun of the Fortunate Aeon, lord of sages, master of the ten powers,
text.en-trans: kalzang nyima tubwang tob chü dak

text.en: Surrounded by the vast, oceanic gatherings of your retinue—
text.en-trans: sangye changsem nyenrang sokyé sok

text.en: Buddhas, bodhisattvas, śrāvakas, pratyekabuddhas and ordinary beings—
text.en-trans: khor tsok gyatsö yongsu korwa yi

text.en: King of the Śākyas, at your feet I pray.
text.en-trans: shakyé gyalpö zhab la solwa deb

text.en: To all those places where the Bliss-gone Buddha dwelled,
text.en-trans: deshek zhuk dang chak dang zhengpa sok

text.en: Where he sat, where he walked, and where he stood,
text.en-trans: gangdu dzepé né nam tamché la’ang

text.en: I pay homage with utmost respect of body, speech and mind,
text.en-trans: go sum güpa chenpö chaktsal zhing

text.en: And offer this heartfelt prayer: inspire me with your blessings!
text.en-trans: nying né solwa deb so jingyi lob

text.en: To thegandholashrine, white as a water-crystal jewel,
text.en-trans: norbu chushel tar kar gandho la

text.en: An offering stūpa which Indra magically created,
text.en-trans: gyajin trul gyi zöpé chörten ni

text.en: And which is filled to overflowing above and below
text.en-trans: teng dang oktu dezhin shekpa yi

text.en: With the precious relics of tathāgatas, I pray.
text.en-trans: ringsel churbur tam la solwa deb

text.en: To the foundational ground with its seven vajra qualities,
text.en-trans: chödün denpé dorjé sa zhi ni

text.en: Indestructible even at the termination of an age,
text.en-trans: kalpa jik kyang shikpar mi nü shing

text.en: Where the Buddha's dharmadhātu wisdom mind
text.en-trans: gyalwé tuk kyi chöying dorjé ché

text.en: Is represented in the great crossed-vajra throne, I pray.
text.en-trans: gyadram den du ting la solwa deb

text.en: The teacher's representative, the Mahābodhi image,
text.en-trans: tönpé zhalkyin changchub chenpö ku

text.en: Which is no different from the Lord of Sages in person,
text.en-trans: tubwang ngö su zhuk dang khyé mepa

text.en: And appears according to beings' merit and appreciation.
text.en-trans: semchen sönam möpa tar nangwa

text.en: To this wondrous, great liberator-upon-sight, I pray.
text.en-trans: ngotsar tongdrol chenpor solwa deb

text.en: To thebodhivṛkṣa,1created through the power of aspiration,
text.en-trans: bhodhi briksha mönlam tü drub ching

text.en: Like a magical fruit-bearing tree of varied jewels,
text.en-trans: rinchen natsok jönshing drebur den

text.en: Which plants the seed of liberation in those it shades
text.en-trans: dribma pok dang lung gi dzi chok kyi

text.en: And those touched by the same gust of wind, I pray.
text.en-trans: tarpé sabön deb la solwa deb

text.en: To this place where bodhi trees abound in all directions,
text.en-trans: choktsam küntu changchub jönpa dang

text.en: With its countless sublime representations of enlightened body, speech and mind,
text.en-trans: ku sung tuk kyi ten chok drang lé dé

text.en: To this magically emanated celestial palace,
text.en-trans: dorjé sa dzin chur bur tampa yi

text.en: Thronged with holders of vajra realization, I pray.
text.en-trans: trulpé zhalmé khang la solwa deb

text.en: To this place arrayed with precious stones andamonika,
text.en-trans: rinchen natsok amonika yi

text.en: Where charming flowers are arranged in rows,
text.en-trans: sa zhi tar zhing metok yi ong dang

text.en: And hills of fragrant medicinal plants lie all around,
text.en-trans: choktsam riwo men pö tsishing gyé

text.en: Enhanced by cliffs of jewel-like rock, I pray.
text.en-trans: rinchen drakri dzé la solwa deb

text.en: To this blissful, sweet, expansive place,
text.en-trans: lha yi chuwo gangga yamu na

text.en: Where a heavenly river with its stream of offering waters
text.en-trans: né rendza sok chöyön trengwé gyün

text.en: From the Gaṅgā, Yamunā and Nairañjanā and more
text.en-trans: chökyi dra tsik dar dir lhung lhung drok

text.en: Burbles and murmurs with the sound of Dharma, I pray.
text.en-trans: dé jam yangpé zhing der solwa deb

text.en: Where buddhas, bodhisattvas, śrāvakas, pratyekabuddhas, vidyādharas,
text.en-trans: sangye changsem nyenrang rigdzin dang

text.en: And vīras and ḍākinīs all gather like clouds
text.en-trans: pawo khandro trin tar tibpa yi

text.en: To sing praises and pour down vast showers of offering—
text.en-trans: tö yang drok dang chöpé char chen beb

text.en: To this place extolled by the victorious ones of the three times, I pray.
text.en-trans: dü sum gyalwé ngak der solwa deb

text.en: In this most sacred, most sublime of locations,
text.en-trans: detar zhing gi chokgyur dampa dir

text.en: May I take birth, first among the retinue of future buddhas,
text.en-trans: ma ong sangye jamchen lasokpé

text.en: Maitreya and the rest, to receive their prophecies
text.en-trans: khor gyi tokmar kyé shing lungten nö

text.en: And carry out the activity of supreme awakening.
text.en-trans: changchub chok gi chöpa ché gyur chik

text.en: I offer vast oceanic clouds of real and imagined gifts,
text.en-trans: ngöjor yitrul chötrin gyatsö chö

text.en: Confess all misdeeds and downfalls, rejoice in virtue,
text.en-trans: dik lhung kün shak gé la jé yirang

text.en: Request the turning of the Dharma Wheel, plead against the passing into nirvāṇa,
text.en-trans: chökhor kul zhing nya ngen mi da sol

text.en: And dedicate all amassed virtue towards the awakening of beings.
text.en-trans: gé tsok drowa changchub chir ngo o

text.en: From this moment on, throughout all my future lives,
text.en-trans: deng né zung té tserab tamché du

text.en: May I always serve the teacher, King of the Śākyas.
text.en-trans: tönpa shakyé gyalpö zhab nyen ching

text.en: May I gain the power to illuminate the precious Dharma
text.en-trans: tenpa rinchen salwar jepa dang

text.en: And subjugate all who would harm the teachings.
text.en-trans: ten la nö nam dulwé tu tob shok

text.en: May I never fall prey to obstacles or demons,
text.en-trans: barché dü kyi namyang mitsuk shing

text.en: May my lifespan, merit and intelligence increase,
text.en-trans: tsé dang sönam lodrö rab pel té

text.en: And through the expansive light of twofold wisdom,
text.en-trans: khyen nyi yeshe nangwa gyepa dang

text.en: May I bring benefit to others in limitless ways.
text.en-trans: zhen la penpa tayé jungwar shok

text.en: When the time comes for me to awaken at the Vajra Seat,
text.en-trans: namzhik dorjé den du ngön jang chub

text.en: May I accomplish all the buddhas' deeds without exception,
text.en-trans: sangye dzepa malü yongdzok shing

text.en: Perfectly turn the Wheel of Dharma on an immense scale,
text.en-trans: chökyi khorlo gyachen rab kor né

text.en: And liberate all beings, as infinite as space in number.
text.en-trans: namkha nyampé drowa rab drol shok
